CustomField.formula: IF( zzzInbound_Day_date_time__c = 0 , "Saturday", IF( zzzInbound_Day_date_time__c = 1 , "Sunday", IF( zzzInbound_Day_date_time__c = 2 , "Monday", IF( zzzInbound_Day_date_time__c = 3 , "Tuesday", IF( zzzInbound_Day_date_time__c = 4 , "Wednesday", IF( zzzInbound_Day_date_time__c = 5 , "Thursday", IF( zzzInbound_Day_date_time__c = 6 , "Friday","Error")))))))
CustomField.label: Return - Day
